title: Egg

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > At night, choose a player to learn from them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> The first night you are attacked, you will hatch and become a random role of your most recently learned from target. If you haven't learned yet, you become a random neutral.
Win Con:
> Hatch and complete your new goal.

desc:
Post 3391
*"Better scramble like an egg before you get folded like an omelet."*
